title: 49: The Myth Blasting Episode (April Edition)
itunes:title: The Myth Blasting Episode (April Edition)
description: He’s back! Our good friend Dr. Robert J. Davis, a.k.a. “The Healthy Skeptic,” is here to blast more myths! Questions about intermittent fasting, vegetarian diets, vitamins, cold remedies… All these questions and more will be answered in this episode of **Chew the Right Thing!** TUNE IN NOW!
